# abbreviated

**Type Property**

Shows the fields in the abbreviation. For example, “2 hr, 10 min”, “2小時10分鐘”

## Declaration

```swift
static var abbreviated: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style { get }
```
title: abbreviated
